text: Ēṉeṉṟāl, avarkaḷ (taṅkaḷ illaṅkaḷiliruntu) veḷiyēṟṟappaṭṭāl, ivarkaḷ avarkaḷuṭaṉ veḷiyēṟa māṭṭārkaḷ. Avarkaḷai etirttu (evarum) pōr purintāl, avarkaḷukku utavi puriya muṉvaravum māṭṭārkaḷ. Muṉvanta pōtilum, niccayamāka puṟaṅkāṭṭiyē ōṭuvārkaḷ. Piṉṉar (evarālumē) avarkaḷ ettakaiya utaviyum peṟa māṭṭārkaḷ
